Favored Music

An ongoing playlist by Jeremy P. Beasley

The Knift Thrower II — Ben Von Wildenhaus
Threads Across Water — Richard Skelton
Lord Knows Best — Dirty Beaches
Confetti — Cold Cave
On Leaving — Danny Paul Grody
Knockin' On Heaven's Door — Antony & The Johnsons

FOUR TEETH — True Widow

That's all for now.
